title.b: How can I see a hierarchical view of my contacts?

task.shortdesc: Use the Organization View panel to see an organizational tree view of your corporate directory-based contacts. You can find the organizational position of someone in your contact list, view business cards, search for and contact other chat partners who are a part of your organization, and add them to your contact list. Your administrator might not enable this option.

result.p: The contact displays in the Organization View panel showing their position within the structure of the organization. From the Organization View panel, you can drag a contact or an entire group from the panel into your contact list, start a chat, find contact information, and more.
